known_issues: Regression: newer versions after v56 are 'ruined' per user; need rollback to v56

existing_features.title: Restore the application’s UI styling and layout to match Version 56 by removing/undoing the styling/layout changes introduced in later versions (notably Version 58+), ensuring a consistent neutral Shadcn/Tailwind look across the app shell and quiz-related screens (including PreGameQuestionCountView, PreQuizSummaryView, and QuizResults).

Restore Version 56 header navigation behavior so that the “Play” and “Edit” header actions are visible throughout the start flow and non-game views, and are hidden only while the user is actively in the in-game question-answering screen (the active quiz step).
Update the build/version identity shown in the UI to report Version 56 (e.g., the footer build version and any diagnostics build info), so the published build is clearly labeled as v56.

new_feature_requests.summary: Rollback deployment/build to Version 56 due to newer versions being ruined

projectName: Rollback app behavior to match Version 56 and label build as v56
